title: Hampton police: Teen hurt in Saturday shooting at Zaxby’s parking lot
content:
HAMPTON, Va. (WAVY) — Police say a 17-year-old was injured in a shooting in Hampton Saturday.
At 10:13 p.m., dispatchers received a call after a gunshot victim walked into the Sentara CarePlex Hospital. Officers responded and met with the victim, a teenager. He had a single gunshot wound that is considered to be non life-threatening. The teen told police he was shot while in the parking lot of Zaxby’s, located in the 2200 block of Todds Lane.
Police do not have any information about suspects or a motive in this shooting.
Anyone with information about this shooting is encouraged to call the Hampton Police Division at 727-6111 or the Crime Line at 1-888-LOCK-U-UP.
